title: It Starts From Now, Heart Pounding Time!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>CYaRon!’s live is starting soon! Haa~.... my heart is beating fast<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Why are you nervous, Ayumu-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>On times where a fun thing is about to begin…. Don’t your heart pound and your chest tightens, somewhat?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I see…. When a happy moment is coming you also become nervous, huh…. That’s pretty cute. Kasumin could use that. Memo memo….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s nothing! Ayumu-senpai, let’s practice swinging our penlights<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Su-, sure….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>When the live starts, your worries and heart pound will go somewhere else. Plus, during the live you will become so focused on it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s just like you say, Kasumi-chan! Yeah, let’s practice! Whatever song comes I’m perfectly prepared<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is also perfect at them!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
